prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Synth Lead, Bass, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Organ, Synth Lead, Bass, and Drums, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Synth Lead, Bass, and Drums, with no Piano.

Style 3:
No Piano is present in this song, which includes Organ, Synth Lead, Bass, and Drums.
